creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
The menu generated in site area is always generic.xsp as the doctype parameter
is not set in the request. The menu generation should depend on the document type.

Created attachment 15008
Patch for info.xmap

Adds doctype parameter for lenya-page request. menu.xmap relies on this
parameter for correct selection of menu xsp.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 15009
Patch for info.xmap

Patch file replacement with correct path settings.

Patch does not work for "documents" without a proper doc type like 'authoring',
'trash', 'archive'. Patch follows to fix this ...
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 15057
Patch for info.xmap

Thanks to Simon Litwan. Fixes doctype retrieval for placeholder documents like
'authoring', 'trash', 'archive'.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 15061
Patch for info.xmap

First check if language version exists before getting document type.
